messages.subject: Another picture
messages.msgSnippet: I have posted another picture under Single Originals , this time of Hiro in the alternate future from Jidai Monogatari -- or, as he is known in that
messages.messageBody:
I have posted another picture under "Single Originals", this time of
Hiro in the alternate future from "Jidai Monogatari"-- or, as he is
known in that universe-- Tokugawa Suruga no Kami Minamoto Hirotada
Ason, Edo Bakufu Nijuuni taishogun" (translation: "Tokugawa,
Protector of Suruga, Minamoto Hirotada Ason, 22nd Tokugawa shogun").
Check it out!

-M.
